tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELD_X False isArrayFIELD_Y False output_data_TREND $output_data_TREND name SAGA.statistics_regression.11 TABLE $TABLE FIELD_X $FIELD_X FIELD_Y $FIELD_Y FORMULA '$FORMULA' FORMULAS $FORMULAS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TREND $OutputSection_TREND.outputType_TREND transmissionMode_TREND $OutputSection_TREND.transmissionMode_TREND

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: FIELD_X
param.label: X Values
param.help: X Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELD_Y
param.label: Y Values
param.help: Y Values The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FORMULAS
param.label: Pre-defined Formulas
param.option: a + b * x + c * x^2 + d * x^3 (cubic)

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TREND
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TREND
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
